features: Interactive spinning wheel with Sunday activities
notes: Canvas-based spinning wheel (easier animation than SVG)
Activities: Sleep In, Brunch, Museum, Park Walk, Read, Cook, Game, Movie, Clean, Nothing
Spin button below wheel (min 50px height for mobile)
Wheel uses noir colors: #7ec8e3, #ff0000, #00ffff alternating segments
Result announcement in terminal-style text below
No game controls needed - single tap-to-spin interaction
Reference friday-wheel.html for spin mechanics if it exists
localStorage to track last 5 spins for 'history' feature

userPrompt: make a spinning wheel for what to do on a sunday, modeled after the friday wheel

warnings.message: Script appears truncated - font declaration incomplete at end

docs.releaseNotes: yeah built this Sunday activity spinner with touch/click wheel animation and visual pointer - tap to spin and let the wheel decide your weekend vibe, classic noir carnival aesthetic with terminal-styled segments
